titleStmt.title: Autarchy, or, The art of self-government in a moral essay : in three parts : first written to a gentleman in the university, and since fitted for publick use.
titleStmt.author: G. B. (George Burghope)

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Burghope by NUC pre-1956 imprints. Wing attributes this work to both Burghope (Wing B5730) and George Bright (Wing 4670).
This item appears at reels 708:15 and 1277:17.
Wing number B4670 cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM).
Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library and Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
